nodes.text: The MHU-6e Mobile Habitation Unit was a bulky transport model designed by Sienar-Jaemus Fleet Systems for temporary planetary occupation. It featured bunk, a med bay, and cockpit.

Lieutenant Wulfgar Kath and his unit was assigned one of the models for his assignment to Black Spire Outpost and hunt down the Resistance spy Vi Moradi. They landed it in the outskirts and deployed their troops on patrol. When they captured Moradi, they brought her there for interrogation before her allies mounted a rescue. Eventually the Resistance came up with a plan to hack the MHU and force it to explode once in space.
The MHU appears in the 2019 novel Galaxy's Edge: Black Spire, written by Delilah S. Dawson.
